tags.name: paper-audio-player
tags.description:
A custom audio player with material paper style and clean design.

Example:

   <paper-audio-player src="audio.mp3"></paper-audio-player>

### Styling the player:

This player has an accent color, and you have two option to modify it:

- **Option 1**: Using the *color property* on element. This one is handy if you need to modify the color dynamically.


   <paper-audio-player color="#F05C38" src="audio.mp3"></paper-audio-player>


- **Option 2**: Using the *custom CSS property*:



   paper-audio-player {
      --paper-audio-player-color: #e91e63;
   }

The following mixins are available for styling:

Custom property                             | Description                                 | Default
--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------|----------
--paper-audio-player-color                  | Color of the element                        | blueviolet

Attributes:

  * `src` {`string`} - 

  * `title` {`string`} - 

  * `autoPlay` {`boolean`} - 

  * `preload` {`string`} - 

  * `currentTime` {`number`} - 

  * `timeLeft` {`number`} - 

  * `smallSkip` {`number`} - 

  * `largeSkip` {`number`} - 

  * `error` {`boolean`} - 

  * `timeOffset` {`number`} - 

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-color: grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `src` {`string`} - 

  * `title` {`string`} - 

  * `autoPlay` {`boolean`} - 

  * `preload` {`string`} - 

  * `currentTime` {`number`} - 

  * `timeLeft` {`number`} - 

  * `smallSkip` {`number`} - 

  * `largeSkip` {`number`} - 

  * `error` {`boolean`} - 

  * `timeOffset` {`number`} - 

  * `schemaResourceID` {`string`} - 

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-color: grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `__utils` - 

  * `colors` - make the default theme dark?

  * `_template` {`HTMLTemplateElement | null`} - 

  * `_importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `rootPath` {`string`} - 

  * `importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `root` {`HTMLElement | ShadowRoot | StampedTemplate | null`} - 

  * `$` - 

  * `_overrideLegacyUndefined` {`boolean`} - 

  * `PROPERTY_EFFECT_TYPES` -

attributes.name: title
attributes.description:
`title` {`string`} - 

Property: title

Default: Click to play this audio file

attributes.name: schemaMap
attributes.description:
`schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

Property: schemaMap

Default: [object Object]

attributes.name: accent-color
attributes.description:
`accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-color: grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

Property: accentColor

Default: grey

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description:
`dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Property: dark

Default: false

attributes.name: colors
attributes.description:
`colors` - make the default theme dark?

Property: colors

Default: colors
